Uses of Interface
org.jasig.cas.services.ReloadableServicesManager

  • Packages that use ReloadableServicesManager 
    Package Description
    org.jasig.cas.services
    This package is contains classes related to the restriction of CAS usage to a particular set of services.
    org.jasig.cas.services.jmx  
    org.jasig.cas.services.web
    This package contains all the controllers and validator for the services management.
